gallery.description-1: Guava juice packed with vitamin C, antioxidants, and fiber, making it a great choice for boosting immunity and promoting digestion.

gallery.description-2: Freshly sliced guavas on a wooden cutting board, with pink interiors contrasting against their green skin and a coral-colored background

gallery.description-3: Known for its health benefits, guava supports digestion and boosts immunity due to its high fiber and vitamin content.

gallery.description-4: A guava tree branch with green guavas hanging among vibrant leaves, illuminated by natural sunlight

gallery.description-5: Guava is a tropical fruit with a sweet, fragrant aroma and a slightly grainy texture.

gallery.description-6: Close-up of a cultivated field with young plants sprouting from freshly plowed soil, bathed in warm golden sunlight
